vote.title: Reappointment of William D. Fergus, Jr., Northwest Title of Companies, Inc., 1160 Dublin Road, Suite 500, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the East Franklinton Review Board (EFRB) with a new term expiration date of 07/31/2027 (resumé attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Reappointment of William D. Fergus, Jr., Northwest Title of Companies, Inc., 1160 Dublin Road, Suite 500, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the East Franklinton Review Board (EFRB) with a new term expiration date of 07/31/2027 (resumé attached).
